title: Real Estate Transaction Coordinator
job_overview:
Position Overview:
As our Transaction Coordinator, you’ll be the backbone of our transaction process, ensuring every file is accurate, compliant, and progressing on schedule. You’ll work closely with our agents, clients, and vendors to create a seamless transaction experience.

Key Responsibilities:
 • Manage all aspects of the transaction process from contract to close
 • Ensure all required documents are complete and compliant with brokerage and legal standards
 • Communicate proactively with clients, agents, lenders, attorneys, and other parties to coordinate timelines and document delivery
 • Maintain and update transaction checklists and databases
 • Track critical deadlines and ensure timely completion of tasks
 • Input and maintain data in systems such as MLS, Sisu, Dotloop, and Follow Up Boss
 • Provide administrative support to agents as needed related to transactions
 • Keep transaction files organized and audit-ready

Requirements:
 • Experience required: Minimum of 1 year working as a Transaction Coordinator on a real estate team handling multiple simultaneous transactions
 • Strong knowledge of real estate documents, contracts, and compliance standards
 • Preferred experience with systems including Sisu, MLS, Dotloop, and Follow Up Boss
 • Exceptional attention to detail and organizational skills
 • Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
 • Ability to work independently and manage multiple deadlines
